meanings.sent1: She expends all her energy playing outside.
meanings.sent2: He expends his allowance on toys and candy.
meanings.sent3: The hungry caterpillar expends all the leaves on the tree.
meanings.sent4: The marathon runner expends every ounce of strength to reach the finish line.
meanings.sent5: The flashlight expends its battery power quickly in the dark.

meanings.sent1: The company expends money on new equipment.
meanings.sent2: They expends their savings on a vacation.
meanings.sent3: The magician expends coins from behind people's ears.
meanings.sent4: She expends her time and effort on charitable causes.
meanings.sent5: The student expends his lunch money on snacks from the vending machine.

meanings.definition: Put out, use up energy or resources
meanings.sent1: The athlete expends all his strength in the final sprint.
meanings.sent2: The campfire expends all the firewood quickly.
meanings.sent3: The superhero expends his powers to save the city.
meanings.sent4: The car expends fuel as it travels long distances.
meanings.sent5: The phone expends battery life when used for extended periods.
